# datadog_team_hierarchy_links (Resource)

Provides a Datadog TeamHierarchyLinks resource. This can be used to create and manage Datadog Team Hierarchy Links.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `parent_team_id` (String) ID of the parent team the team hierarchy link is associated with.
- `sub_team_id` (String) ID of the sub team the team hierarchy link is associated with.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the team hierarchy link was created.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `provisioned_by` (String) The user who created the team hierarchy link.
